sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will begin trading ex-dividend on November 29, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.125 per share is scheduled to be paid on December 14, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased COTY prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 5th quarter that COTY has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $17, the dividend yield is 2.94%.
The previous trading day's last sale of COTY was $17, representing a -18.58% decrease from the 52 week high of $20.88 and a 19.38% increase over the 52 week low of $14.24.
COTY is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
COTY's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$.6.
Zacks Investment Research reports COTY's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 7.05%, compared to an industry average of 11.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the COTY Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
